executive summary.company synopsis: Acuity Brands, Inc. is an industrial technology company headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, specializing in lighting and building management solutions. The company designs, manufactures, and markets a wide range of products, including luminaires, lighting controls, power supplies, prismatic skylights, and building management systems. Acuity Brands operates through two primary segments: Acuity Brands Lighting and Lighting Controls (ABL), which offers commercial, architectural, and specialty lighting solutions, and the Intelligent Spaces Group (ISG), which provides building management solutions and software. The company's products serve customers in commercial, institutional, industrial, infrastructure, and residential sectors, offering solutions for new construction, renovation, and maintenance applications. Acuity Brands markets its products under various brand names, including Lithonia Lighting, Holophane, Peerless, Gotham, Mark Architectural Lighting, and Juno. The company has a global presence with operations in North America, Europe, and Asia.
